item.description: Pedestrian Struck; INC#1344; 07:35PM; 2141 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3regeK0; Harvard Heights; PRELIM: 1 person (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances) deceased at scene after reportedly being struck by a vehicle. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic (Incident #3394).; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; E226 EM1 RA26 T26; CH4; 10; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#1130; 04:47PM; 8700 N Valley Circle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cScJk7; Chatsworth; LAFD ground and air response to a teenage mountain bicyclist on a remote trail in the Simi Hills near Woolsey Canyon, who sustained an apparent arm fracture in a fall. He will be hoisted into a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter for inflight care during direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC17 E106 E296 E90 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA106 RH114 T96; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0334; 07:50AM; 3866 W Boyce Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rbkpq5; Atwater Village; 33 Firefighters took just 20 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames within a 2,785 square-foot 2 story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC2 BC5 E220 E227 E250 E55 E56 RA56 RA835 T20 T27; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0334; 07:30AM; 3866 W Boyce Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rbkpq5; Atwater Village; PRELIM: 2 story home with heavy smoke showing from the 1st floor.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC2 BC5 E220 E227 E250 E55 E56 RA56 RA835 T20 T27; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0269; 06:11AM; 4033 S Nicolet Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FNHmUn; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters held the fire to the unit of origin with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E266 E294 E34 E43 E68 RA894 RA94 T66 T94; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0269; 05:58AM; 4033 S Nicolet Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FNHmUn; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; Two story apartment building with fire showing in one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E266 E294 E34 E43 E68 RA894 RA94 T66 T94; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0167; 05:09AM; 1530 E 16th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CWepDZ; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 115 firefighters battling this Major Emergency structure fire achieved a knockdown in one hour and 43 minutes. The fire was contained primarily to the unit of origin, with the two adjoining buildings defended from extension to the interior. One firefighter was transported for a minor, non-life threatening leg injury. Crews will remain on scene through the morning conducting overhaul operations. Per protocol, LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is on scene to conduct the cause investigation. No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E17 E203 E209 E210 E215 E220 E221 E227 E239 E248 E260 E261 E3 E33 E48 E66 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 JT3 PH1 RA14 RA17 RA21 RA9 SH12 SQ21 SQ48 T10 T15 T20 T21 T27 T3 T39 T48 T60 T61 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 1 13 15 16; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0167; 05:03AM; 1530 E 16th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CWepDZ; Downtown; Firefighters made good progress against the fire and are taking a tactical pause - stopping the flow of all water to evaluate the status of the fire. Officers will inspect the building and determine where to focus the efforts and redistribute resources as needed. No additional resources are anticipated to be needed. One firefighter was taken for first care due to a non-life threatening leg injury. No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E17 E203 E209 E210 E215 E220 E221 E227 E239 E248 E260 E261 E3 E33 E48 E66 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 PH1 RA14 RA17 RA21 RA9 SH12 SQ21 SQ48 T10 T15 T20 T21 T27 T3 T39 T48 T60 T61 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 1 13 15 16; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0167; 04:27AM; 1530 E 16th ST; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xyenRG; Downtown; Address updated as shown. The well involved fire building is a textile business. There are two additional, attached structures exposed on the Bravo and Delta sides which are separated by a division wall and are being defended from extension. One firefighter sustained a non-life threatening injury and is being evaluated. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E17 E203 E209 E210 E215 E220 E221 E227 E239 E260 E261 E3 E33 E66 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA14 RA17 RA21 RA9 SQ21 T10 T15 T20 T21 T27 T3 T39 T60 T61 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 1 13 15 16; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0167; 04:00AM; 1613 S Tarleton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xyenRG; Downtown; A large outside fire extended into two commercial structures, one is now well involved in fire and the attack on that building is now defensive. The 2nd exposed building appears to have only had a surface fire on the roof and did not extend into the structure. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 3:26AM.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E17 E209 E210 E215 E221 E239 E260 E33 E9 EM1 RA14 RA17 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T39 T60 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
